name: Intelex Incident Reporting
description: A comprehensive EHS platform that automates incident capture, analysis, and compliance reporting.
target_audience_match: Great for compliance managers who need to stay ahead of reporting demands across multiple locations without losing sleep.

name: incident.io
description: An AI-powered platform for rapid incident response and reporting, tailored for fast-paced teams.
target_audience_match: Perfect for tech teams trying to resolve incidents fast without skipping crucial steps.

name: Cority Incident Management
description: A robust solution for collecting, analyzing, and reporting incidents with a focus on root cause analysis.
target_audience_match: Ideal for quality and safety leaders who want to stop repeat incidents at the source.

name: VelocityEHS Incident Management
description: Simplifies workplace incident reporting and tracking, emphasizing prevention through risk analysis.
target_audience_match: Perfect for safety teams who want to prevent problems before they escalate.

name: Kaseware Incident Management
description: An integrated platform for swift incident response, documentation, and resolution across various industries.
target_audience_match: Great for operations leaders who need fast, well-documented incident resolution across teams.
